Is anyone impacted by the outage?
it's slowly starting to limp back .. but its slow..
yes - I wish we had more information
Yep, kinda hard to pinpoint the next steps. I'm not sure if they are also updating the status page as they find stuff.
<https://status.HubSpot.com/>

<@UQNEXHW14> it would be very helpful if HubSpot could give more detailed outage information.

The status page indicating "Major Outage" across the entire platform makes it seem as though we should not expect anything to be operational, but that doesn't appear to be the case.

I think one of the most critical areas to provide more granular detail is in regards to the API, which with this particular outage seems to be very mixed. Some endpoints don't appear to have any issues, some seem to only be returning 400's, and others are spotty.

Providing more detailed information both during outages and afterwards would help me communicate with stakeholders on various teams and inform the course of action.
I'll definitely share this feedback with the team, thanks <@U041UNABGFK>

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Would appreciate some input on the following!  Trying to understand best practices for managing SaaS in HubSpot for CSMs/AM teams.
I share the same feeling, <@U041UNABGFK>; thanks for voicing it. And thanks, <@UQNEXHW14>, for collecting it.
Shared. I fully agree with you for the record! I'll be championing this on y'alls behalf internally.

Hi everyone
Has the HubSpot service been completely reset? I use the following web service: <https://api.HubSpot.com/conversations/v3/visitor-identification/tokens/create> Occasionally it returns a response, but most of the time it doesn't or it takes too long to respond, this situation is causing us problems with the chat widget.

It's worth clarifying that I'm using OAutn authentication. Is anyone else experiencing the same problem?
I'll be waiting for any comments.
<@U0390FR1QH4> come join the fun in <#C2YHAHB6K|api>
Ok
For folks seeing API issues: <https://status.HubSpot.com/incidents/7wnpp1n1lvtf>
This should now be resolved.
